org.dspace.xmlworkflow

Class XmlWorkflowFactoryImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dspace.xmlworkflow.XmlWorkflowFactoryImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    XmlWorkflowFactory

    public class XmlWorkflowFactoryImpl
extends Object
implements XmlWorkflowFactory
    The workflowfactory is responsible for parsing the workflow xml file and is used to retrieve the workflow for a certain collection
    Author:
    Bram De Schouwer (bram.deschouwer at dot com), Kevin Van de Velde (kevin at atmire dot com), Ben Bosman (ben at atmire dot com), Mark Diggory (markd at atmire dot com)
